title: What BTS songs best fit as friendship songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: BTS writes their lyrics and through the years, some of them are about love, hate, family, and friendship. So I’ll write down some BTS songs that are about friendship. (These are only their original songs, I won’t include covers) Moving OnThis song has three speakers, the rap line (RM, Suga, and J-Hope) and this song is about moving through a new home together, reminiscing their memories— their worries, the disagreements, the teamwork, and how they became close to each other. This also a new beginning for someone who’s moving in a new location. BeginThe speaker, Jungkook, is telling his story and seeing his brothers (the members) as his guide through his adolescence since he started young. They are the friends that are there for him that made him “begin” realizing that he can dream big. Also, his brothers will cry with him and his shoulder to cry on. MikrokosmosThis song is about friends looking at the stars while being happy with each other that they are living in the same universe together. This is also dedicated to their fans, the ARMYs. Spring DayAlthough this is a sad song, this song is about missing a loved one, how they wanted their friend to stay a little longer with them but it’s not possible to force them because they have changed or they are really gone. You Never Walk AloneIt’s definitely obvious to the title that the song is about being with a friend and never letting them walk and face their trials alone. It means that they got each other, whether they succeed or failed. Good DayThis song is focused on friendship that is also a “family”. Quoting the “Oath of the Peach Garden”, which means that though they have different surnames, they still unite as brothers. Their joy and pain that they share, the understanding between each other, the unchanging feeling that is still there (until now), and also the relationship they have. This is such a lively song so it’s a must listen. FriendsThis song is about the soulmate’s friendship: Jimin and V. Starting from going in the same school, fighting about food, giving each other gifts, making promises, and referring to each other as “soul mates”, this is definitely a song you can recommend to your best friend. Here are some BTS pictures for a happy day :)

BTS has a lot of songs that talk about friendship, and some are more than friendship and it is about love. These are some songs I think it is to do with friendship: Spring day: the lyrics is about missing someone, and it talks about how they are hopefully going to meet when spring comes. It also talks about how they tried to forget about that person, but they can’t. The song ends with lyrics about eventually meeting them soon. Lyrics from song: ‘You know it all, you’re my best friend’ or there is this bit in the middle where Namjoon goes ‘friend’. Home: it talks about how everywhere is their ‘home’ as long as they have one another. However, if they don’t have one another they feel weird, lost, etc. Lyrics from the song: “as long as you are here everywhere is my home” Good day: for sure this is one as well, and the lyrics says that you won’t be alone and they’ll be by your side always. It talks about tomorrow being a better day, and they can laugh with each other and lean on each other. This talks about true friendship. Lyrics from song: “My friend don’t be afraid” “you can lean on me, lay on me” “I’ll be by your side, we’ll be ok” “we may argue sometimes, but we make up quickly” Begin: this is Jungkook’s solo in the wings album. He is very grateful of the other members for bringing him out of his shell and he’s admitting to them that his one weakness, the one time he’s in pain, is when they are in pain. Lyrics from song: “I feel like dying when my brother is sad” “You make me begin” Mikrokosmos: this is about how everyone shines in different ways, and the lyrics is about love. Lyrics from song: “You got me, I dream of you and I got you” “That darkness is not moonlight, it's us” Hope this helps~~
